specialTalents.name: Languages.
specialTalents.description: You know Druidic and Sylvan languages.

talents.talent: Gain advantage on casting one spell you know
+2 to Strength, Constitution or Wisdom score
Choose a talent or +2 points to distribute to ability scores

description.name: Spellcasting.
description.description: You can cast druid spells you know. You know two tier 1 spells of your choice from the druid spell list. Each time you gain a level, you choose new druid spells to learn according to the Spells Known table.

spellTalents.name: Wildshape.
spellTalents.description: You know the wildshape spell. It doesn't count toward your number of known spells.
